seriesJson.title: The piano sonatas of Haydn
seriesJson.description: Illustrated lecture series featuring 34 piano sonatas of Haydn as demonstrated by Canadian pianist Raymond Dudley, Concert Artist in Residence at the University of Cincinnati College-Conservatory.

node.title: Sixth program, part two
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, presents pianist Raymond Dudley performing sonatas composed by Joseph Haydn.

creator.name: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio), U. of Cincinnati
